description: Life guard on duty, check. Sun block, check. You are ready to have some fun! Choose ultra clear screen protection for your iPad 2 & The new iPad with two myGear Products LifeGuard screen protectors, or block the sun with two Anti-Glare SunBlock protectors. With four total protectors, share with your whole family, or keep a few backups.
title: myGear Products "The new iPad 3 3rd Generation" & Apple iPad 2 Screen Protectors 4 PACK Films (2 Clear and 2 Anti-Glare)
